text: was a Japanese politician. He was a member of the Liberal Democratic Party. He was a member of the House of Councillors in the Diet from 2004 until 2016. Kitagawa was born in Higashiōsaka, Japan Kitagawa died on September 7, 2021 in Osaka, Japan from prostate cancer, aged 78.北川イッセイ元参院議員が死去 大阪選出 国土交通副大臣など ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Politicians from Osaka Prefecture Category:Liberal Democratic Party (Japan) politicians Category:Deaths from prostate cancer
title: Issei Kitagawa
